Dialogue.Page: This planet is covered entirely by water and ice!
It's quite cold because of the dim light from its star, and the constant mini-eclipses from the asteroid belt certainly haven't helped.
However, it's warm enough that water can at least exist, and the atmosphere is perfectly breathable!
Despite that, there appears to be no life on this planet at all.
I wonder why life appears on some planets, but not others?
